ygData.subject: Re: Openglad
ygData.msgSnippet: You need to double click the Openglad exe that is in the folder that you unzipped. If you don t see it, you might have downloaded the Openglad source code

You need to double click the "Openglad" exe that is in the folder that
you unzipped.

If you don't see it, you might have downloaded the Openglad source
code instead of the compiled binary for Windows. Go to the download
page (http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=50083) and
try downloading the "openglad-win32-0.98.zip" file.

Sean

--- In gladiator@yahoogroups.com, "heathtalon" <Heathtalon@h...> wrote:
> 
> 
> I downloaded OpenGlad, and Unzipped it, now how do I play it?
